developer Code Execution - Plan 01 (Iteration 3)
2025-08-13 22:22:34

Code execution result:

üìù Code Python
"keyword">import os "keyword">import json "keyword">import requests "keyword">import time "keyword">from bs4 "keyword">import BeautifulSoup "keyword">from urllib.parse "keyword">import quote_plus, urljoin "keyword">import re print(&#x27;=== ALTERNATIVE APPROACH: WEB SEARCH FOR BASE DATABASE ARTICLES ===') print(&#x27;Objective: Find BASE DDC 633 articles "keyword">with unknown languages via web search') print(&#x27;Strategy: Use web search to find actual BASE articles, then analyze "keyword">for country/flag info\n') # Ensure workspace exists os.makedirs(&#x27;workspace', exist_ok="keyword">True) # Initialize comprehensive research tracking research_data = { &#x27;timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), &#x27;objective': 'Find BASE database articles "keyword">with DDC 633, 2020, unknown languages, "keyword">and unique flags', &#x27;strategy': 'Web search approach to bypass BASE access issues', &#x27;search_phases': [], &#x27;articles_found': [], &#x27;country_analysis': {}, &#x27;flag_candidates': [] } print(&#x27;=== PHASE 1: WEB SEARCH FOR BASE DATABASE ARTICLES ===') print(&#x27;=' * 60) # Headers "keyword">for web requests headers = { &#x27;User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', &#x27;Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8', &#x27;Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.5', &#x27;Connection': 'keep-alive' } # Comprehensive search queries targeting BASE articles base_article_queries = [ # Direct BASE site searches &#x27;site:base-search.net DDC 633 2020', &#x27;site:base-search.net "unknown language" 2020', &#x27;site:base-search.net "language unknown" 2020', &#x27;site:base-search.net "unidentified language" 2020', &#x27;site:base-search.net agriculture 2020 language', # General searches "keyword">for BASE articles &#x27;"BASE Bielefeld" DDC 633 2020 unknown language', &#x27;"Bielefeld Academic Search" 2020 "language unknown"', &#x27;BASE database agriculture 2020 "unidentified language"', &#x27;"base-search.net" 2020 DDC classification unknown', # Agricultural focus (DDC 633) &#x27;agriculture 2020 "unknown language" academic database', &#x27;farming 2020 "language unidentified" research', &#x27;crops 2020 "language unknown" academic paper', &#x27;agricultural research 2020 multilingual database', # Academic database searches &#x27;academic database 2020 "unknown language" agriculture', &#x27;research repository 2020 "unidentified language" farming', &#x27;scholarly articles 2020 "language unknown" crops' ] print(f&#x27;Executing {len(base_article_queries)} targeted web searches...') search_results = [] "keyword">for i, query "keyword">in enumerate(base_article_queries, 1): print(f&#x27;\nSearch {i}/{len(base_article_queries)}: {query}') "keyword">try: # Use DuckDuckGo "keyword">for web search search_url = f&#x27;https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q={quote_plus(query)}' print(f&#x27; Search URL: {search_url}') response = requests.get(search_url, headers=headers, timeout=30) print(f&#x27; Response status: {response.status_code}') "keyword">if response.status_code == 200: # Save search results filename = f&#x27;web_search_{i}_{query.replace(":", "_").replace("\"", "").replace(" ", "_")[:50]}.html' filepath = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', filename) "keyword">with open(filepath, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Results saved: {filename}') # Parse search results "keyword">for relevant links soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, &#x27;html.parser') # Extract links "keyword">and analyze relevance relevant_links = [] "keyword">for link "keyword">in soup.find_all(&#x27;a', href="keyword">True): href = link.get(&#x27;href') link_text = link.get_text().strip() # Check "keyword">for BASE-related "keyword">or academic links "keyword">if href "keyword">and link_text "keyword">and len(link_text) > 10: href_lower = href.lower() text_lower = link_text.lower() # Score relevance relevance_score = 0 # BASE database indicators "keyword">if &#x27;base-search' "keyword">in href_lower "keyword">or 'base-search' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 5 "keyword">if &#x27;bielefeld' "keyword">in href_lower "keyword">or 'bielefeld' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 3 # Content indicators "keyword">if &#x27;2020' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if any(term "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [&#x27;unknown', 'unidentified']): relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if any(term "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [&#x27;language', 'agriculture', 'farming', 'crop']): relevance_score += 1 "keyword">if &#x27;ddc' "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">or '633' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if relevance_score >= 3: # Minimum relevance threshold relevant_links.append({ &#x27;url': href, &#x27;text': link_text[:150], &#x27;relevance_score': relevance_score, &#x27;source_query': query }) print(f&#x27; Found {len(relevant_links)} relevant links') "keyword">if relevant_links: # Sort by relevance "keyword">and take top links relevant_links.sort(key="keyword">lambda x: x[&#x27;relevance_score'], reverse="keyword">True) search_results.extend(relevant_links[:5]) # Top 5 "keyword">from each search print(&#x27; Top relevant links:') "keyword">for j, link "keyword">in enumerate(relevant_links[:3], 1): print(f&#x27; {j}. Score {link["relevance_score"]}: {link["text"][:80]}...') print(f&#x27; URL: {link["url"]}') time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error "keyword">in search {i}: {str(e)}') "keyword">continue # Remove duplicate URLs unique_results = [] seen_urls = set() "keyword">for result "keyword">in search_results: "keyword">if result[&#x27;url'] "keyword">not "keyword">in seen_urls: seen_urls.add(result[&#x27;url']) unique_results.append(result) print(f&#x27;\nüìä WEB SEARCH RESULTS SUMMARY:') print(f&#x27;Total searches conducted: {len(base_article_queries)}') print(f&#x27;Total relevant links found: {len(search_results)}') print(f&#x27;Unique URLs identified: {len(unique_results)}') research_data[&#x27;search_phases'].append({ &#x27;phase': 'web_search_for_base_articles', &#x27;queries_executed': len(base_article_queries), &#x27;relevant_links_found': len(search_results), &#x27;unique_urls': len(unique_results) }) print(&#x27;\n=== PHASE 2: ACCESSING AND ANALYZING PROMISING ARTICLES ===') print(&#x27;=' * 65) "keyword">if unique_results: # Sort by relevance score unique_results.sort(key="keyword">lambda x: x[&#x27;relevance_score'], reverse="keyword">True) print(f&#x27;Analyzing top {min(10, len(unique_results))} most promising articles...') articles_analyzed = [] countries_found = {} "keyword">for i, result "keyword">in enumerate(unique_results[:10], 1): print(f&#x27;\nArticle {i}/10: {result["text"][:80]}...') print(f&#x27;URL: {result["url"]}') print(f&#x27;Relevance score: {result["relevance_score"]}') "keyword">try: # Access the article article_response = requests.get(result[&#x27;url'], headers=headers, timeout=30) print(f&#x27; Response status: {article_response.status_code}') "keyword">if article_response.status_code == 200: # Save article content article_filename = f&#x27;article_{i}_{result["url"].split("/")[-1] "keyword">or "page"}.html' article_path = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', article_filename) "keyword">with open(article_path, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(article_response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Article saved: {article_filename}') # Parse article content article_soup = BeautifulSoup(article_response.text, &#x27;html.parser') article_text = article_soup.get_text() article_text_lower = article_text.lower() print(f&#x27; Content length: {len(article_text):,} characters') # Analyze "keyword">for key criteria analysis = { &#x27;url': result['url'], &#x27;title': result['text'], &#x27;file': article_filename, &#x27;content_length': len(article_text), &#x27;criteria_analysis': { &#x27;has_2020': '2020' "keyword">in article_text, &#x27;has_unknown_language': any(term "keyword">in article_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;unknown language', 'language unknown', 'unidentified language', &#x27;language unidentified', 'language "keyword">not identified' ]), &#x27;has_ddc_633': 'ddc 633' "keyword">in article_text_lower "keyword">or '633' "keyword">in article_text, &#x27;has_agriculture': any(term "keyword">in article_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;agriculture', 'farming', 'crops', 'agricultural' ]), &#x27;has_base_reference': any(term "keyword">in article_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;base-search', 'bielefeld academic search', 'base database' ]) }, &#x27;countries_mentioned': [], &#x27;country_codes_found': [], &#x27;language_indicators': [] } # Extract country information countries_list = [ &#x27;germany', 'deutschland', 'usa', 'united states', 'america', &#x27;uk', 'united kingdom', 'britain', 'england', 'france', &#x27;italy', 'spain', 'netherlands', 'holland', 'sweden', &#x27;norway', 'denmark', 'finland', 'poland', 'czech', &#x27;austria', 'switzerland', 'belgium', 'portugal', 'greece', &#x27;hungary', 'romania', 'bulgaria', 'croatia', 'slovenia', &#x27;slovakia', 'estonia', 'latvia', 'lithuania', 'ireland', &#x27;luxembourg', 'malta', 'cyprus', 'iceland', 'turkey', &#x27;russia', 'ukraine', 'belarus', 'serbia', 'bosnia', &#x27;albania', 'macedonia', 'montenegro', 'moldova', 'georgia', &#x27;armenia', 'azerbaijan', 'kazakhstan', 'uzbekistan', &#x27;kyrgyzstan', 'tajikistan', 'turkmenistan', 'afghanistan', &#x27;pakistan', 'india', 'bangladesh', 'sri lanka', 'nepal', &#x27;bhutan', 'maldives', 'china', 'japan', 'korea', 'mongolia', &#x27;thailand', 'vietnam', 'cambodia', 'laos', 'myanmar', &#x27;malaysia', 'singapore', 'indonesia', 'philippines', &#x27;brunei', 'australia', 'new zealand', 'papua new guinea', &#x27;fiji', 'samoa', 'tonga', 'vanuatu', 'solomon islands' ] found_countries = [] "keyword">for country "keyword">in countries_list: "keyword">if country "keyword">in article_text_lower: found_countries.append(country) "keyword">if country "keyword">not "keyword">in countries_found: countries_found[country] = 0 countries_found[country] += 1 analysis[&#x27;countries_mentioned'] = found_countries # Look "keyword">for country codes (2-letter ISO codes) country_codes = re.findall(r&#x27;\b[A-Z]{2}\b', article_text) analysis[&#x27;country_codes_found'] = list(set(country_codes))[:10] # Unique codes, limit 10 # Look "keyword">for language indicators language_patterns = re.findall(r&#x27;language[s]?[:\s]+([a-zA-Z\s,]+)', article_text_lower) analysis[&#x27;language_indicators'] = language_patterns[:5] articles_analyzed.append(analysis) # Print analysis summary criteria_met = sum(1 "keyword">for v "keyword">in analysis[&#x27;criteria_analysis'].values() "keyword">if v) print(f&#x27; Criteria met: {criteria_met}/5') "keyword">for criterion, met "keyword">in analysis[&#x27;criteria_analysis'].items(): print(f&#x27; {criterion}: {"‚úì" "keyword">if met "keyword">else "‚úó"}') "keyword">if found_countries: print(f&#x27; Countries found: {found_countries[:5]}') "keyword">if analysis[&#x27;country_codes_found']: print(f&#x27; Country codes: {analysis["country_codes_found"][:5]}') # Check "keyword">if this "keyword">is a highly relevant article "keyword">if criteria_met >= 3: print(f&#x27; *** HIGH RELEVANCE ARTICLE ***') research_data[&#x27;articles_found'].append(analysis) time.sleep(1) # Rate limiting "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error accessing article: {str(e)}') "keyword">continue research_data[&#x27;search_phases'].append({ &#x27;phase': 'article_analysis', &#x27;articles_accessed': len(articles_analyzed), &#x27;high_relevance_articles': len(research_data['articles_found']), &#x27;countries_identified': len(countries_found) }) "keyword">else: print(&#x27;No promising articles found "keyword">in web search results') print(&#x27;Trying alternative search approach...') # Alternative approach: Search "keyword">for academic papers mentioning BASE alternative_queries = [ &#x27;"BASE database" agricultural research 2020', &#x27;"Bielefeld Academic Search" unknown language', &#x27;academic repository agriculture 2020 multilingual', &#x27;research database farming 2020 language identification', &#x27;scholarly articles agriculture 2020 "language unknown"' ] print(f&#x27;\nTrying {len(alternative_queries)} alternative searches...') "keyword">for i, query "keyword">in enumerate(alternative_queries, 1): print(f&#x27;\nAlternative search {i}: {query}') "keyword">try: search_url = f&#x27;https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q={quote_plus(query)}' response = requests.get(search_url, headers=headers, timeout=30) "keyword">if response.status_code == 200: filename = f&#x27;alternative_search_{i}.html' filepath = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', filename) "keyword">with open(filepath, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Results saved: {filename}') # Quick analysis "keyword">for relevant content soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, &#x27;html.parser') text_content = soup.get_text().lower() relevance_indicators = { &#x27;2020': text_content.count('2020'), &#x27;unknown': text_content.count('unknown'), &#x27;language': text_content.count('language'), &#x27;agriculture': text_content.count('agriculture'), &#x27;base': text_content.count('base') } total_relevance = sum(relevance_indicators.values()) print(f&#x27; Relevance score: {total_relevance}') "keyword">if total_relevance > 20: print(f&#x27; *** PROMISING ALTERNATIVE RESULTS ***') time.sleep(2) "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error "keyword">in alternative search: {str(e)}') print(&#x27;\n=== PHASE 3: COUNTRY AND FLAG ANALYSIS ===') print(&#x27;=' * 45) "keyword">if countries_found: print(f&#x27;Countries identified across all sources: {len(countries_found)}') # Sort countries by frequency sorted_countries = sorted(countries_found.items(), key="keyword">lambda x: x[1], reverse="keyword">True) print(&#x27;\nCountry frequency analysis:') "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries: print(f&#x27; ‚Ä¢ {country.title()}: {count} mentions') # Identify unique "keyword">and distinctive flag candidates unique_countries = [country "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries "keyword">if count == 1] rare_countries = [country "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries "keyword">if count <= 2] # Identify countries "keyword">with distinctive flags distinctive_flag_countries = [ &#x27;iceland', 'malta', 'cyprus', 'luxembourg', 'estonia', 'latvia', &#x27;lithuania', 'slovenia', 'montenegro', 'albania', 'macedonia', &#x27;moldova', 'bosnia', 'armenia', 'georgia', 'azerbaijan', &#x27;kazakhstan', 'kyrgyzstan', 'tajikistan', 'turkmenistan', &#x27;uzbekistan', 'bhutan', 'maldives', 'nepal', 'sri lanka', &#x27;bangladesh', 'papua new guinea', 'fiji', 'samoa', 'tonga', &#x27;vanuatu', 'solomon islands', 'brunei' ] found_distinctive = [country "keyword">for country "keyword">in countries_found.keys() "keyword">if country "keyword">in distinctive_flag_countries] research_data[&#x27;country_analysis'] = { &#x27;total_countries': len(countries_found), &#x27;country_frequency': dict(sorted_countries), &#x27;unique_mentions': unique_countries, &#x27;rare_mentions': rare_countries, &#x27;distinctive_flags_found': found_distinctive } print(f&#x27;\nüéØ FLAG ANALYSIS RESULTS:') "keyword">if unique_countries: print(f&#x27;Countries mentioned only once (unique flags): {[c.title() "keyword">for c "keyword">in unique_countries]}') research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates'].extend([{'country': c, 'type': 'unique', 'mentions': 1} "keyword">for c "keyword">in unique_countries]) "keyword">if found_distinctive: print(f&#x27;Countries "keyword">with distinctive flags: {[c.title() "keyword">for c "keyword">in found_distinctive]}') research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates'].extend([{'country': c, 'type': 'distinctive', 'mentions': countries_found[c]} "keyword">for c "keyword">in found_distinctive]) "keyword">if rare_countries: print(f&#x27;Rarely mentioned countries (‚â§2 mentions): {[c.title() "keyword">for c "keyword">in rare_countries]}') research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates'].extend([{'country': c, 'type': 'rare', 'mentions': countries_found[c]} "keyword">for c "keyword">in rare_countries "keyword">if c "keyword">not "keyword">in unique_countries]) # Identify the most unique flag "keyword">if research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates']: # Prioritize: unique > distinctive > rare priority_order = {&#x27;unique': 3, 'distinctive': 2, 'rare': 1} best_candidate = max(research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates'], key="keyword">lambda x: (priority_order[x[&#x27;type']], -x['mentions'])) print(f&#x27;\nüè¥ MOST UNIQUE FLAG CANDIDATE: {best_candidate["country"].title()}') print(f&#x27; Type: {best_candidate["type"].title()}') print(f&#x27; Mentions: {best_candidate["mentions"]}') research_data[&#x27;top_flag_candidate'] = best_candidate "keyword">else: print(&#x27;No countries identified "keyword">in the analyzed content') research_data[&#x27;country_analysis'] = {'total_countries': 0, 'message': 'No countries found'} print(&#x27;\n=== PHASE 4: COMPREHENSIVE RESULTS COMPILATION ===') print(&#x27;=' * 55) # Create comprehensive final report final_report = { &#x27;research_summary': { &#x27;objective': 'Find BASE DDC 633 articles "keyword">from 2020 "keyword">with unknown languages "keyword">and unique flag indicators', &#x27;approach': 'Web search strategy to bypass BASE database access issues', &#x27;execution_timestamp': research_data['timestamp'] }, &#x27;search_execution': { &#x27;web_searches_conducted': len(base_article_queries), &#x27;articles_analyzed': len(research_data.get('articles_found', [])), &#x27;countries_identified': len(countries_found) "keyword">if countries_found "keyword">else 0, &#x27;flag_candidates_found': len(research_data.get('flag_candidates', [])) }, &#x27;key_findings': research_data.get('country_analysis', {}), &#x27;top_flag_candidate': research_data.get('top_flag_candidate', "keyword">None), &#x27;detailed_articles': research_data.get('articles_found', []), &#x27;recommendations': [], &#x27;files_created': [f "keyword">for f "keyword">in os.listdir('workspace') "keyword">if f.endswith(('.html', '.json'))] } # Add recommendations based on findings "keyword">if countries_found: "keyword">if research_data.get(&#x27;top_flag_candidate'): final_report[&#x27;recommendations'].append(f"Primary focus: {research_data['top_flag_candidate']['country'].title()} - identified "keyword">as most unique flag candidate") "keyword">if research_data[&#x27;country_analysis'].get('distinctive_flags_found'): final_report[&#x27;recommendations'].append(f"Examine distinctive flags: {[c.title() "keyword">for c "keyword">in research_data['country_analysis']['distinctive_flags_found']]}") "keyword">else: final_report[&#x27;recommendations'].extend([ "Consider expanding search to include more academic databases", "Try searching "keyword">for specific agricultural journals "keyword">or repositories", "Explore regional "keyword">or national agricultural databases", "Search "keyword">for multilingual agricultural research platforms" ]) # Save comprehensive report report_file = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', 'BASE_comprehensive_research_report.json') "keyword">with open(report_file, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: json.dump(final_report, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii="keyword">False) print(f&#x27;‚úì Comprehensive research report saved: {os.path.basename(report_file)}') # Create executive summary executive_summary = f"""BASE DATABASE RESEARCH - FINAL EXECUTIVE SUMMARY {&#x27;='*60} OBJECTIVE: Find BASE DDC 633 articles "keyword">from 2020 "keyword">with unknown languages "keyword">and unique flag indicators STRATEGY: Web search approach to bypass BASE database access limitations EXECUTION RESULTS: ‚úì {len(base_article_queries)} comprehensive web searches conducted ‚úì "keyword">in detail ‚úì {len(countries_found) "keyword">if countries_found "keyword">else 0} countries identified ‚úì {len(research_data.get(&#x27;flag_candidates', []))} flag candidates found """ "keyword">if countries_found: executive_summary += "COUNTRY/FLAG ANALYSIS:\n" sorted_countries = sorted(countries_found.items(), key="keyword">lambda x: x[1], reverse="keyword">True) "keyword">for executive_summary += f" Mentions: {candidate[&#x27;mentions']}\n" executive_summary += f" Reason: {&#x27;Only mentioned once - highly unique' "keyword">if candidate['type'] == 'unique' "keyword">else 'Distinctive flag design' "keyword">if candidate['type'] == 'distinctive' "keyword">else 'Rarely mentioned'}\n" "keyword">else: executive_summary += "OUTCOME: No countries "keyword">with flag indicators found "keyword">in accessible content\n" executive_summary += "RECOMMENDATIONS:\n" "keyword">for rec "keyword">in final_report[&#x27;recommendations']: executive_summary += f"‚Ä¢ {rec}\n" executive_summary += f"\nFILES CREATED: {len(final_report[&#x27;files_created'])} files saved to workspace/" # Save executive summary summary_file = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', 'BASE_final_executive_summary.txt') "keyword">with open(summary_file, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(executive_summary) print(f&#x27;‚úì Executive summary saved: {os.path.basename(summary_file)}') print(&#x27;\n' + '='*80) print(&#x27;BASE DATABASE RESEARCH - ALTERNATIVE APPROACH COMPLETE') print(&#x27;='*80) print(executive_summary) print(&#x27;\n*** FINAL RESEARCH MISSION STATUS ***') "keyword">if countries_found "keyword">and research_data.get(&#x27;flag_candidates'): print(&#x27;‚úÖ SUCCESS: Countries "keyword">and flag candidates identified through alternative approach') "keyword">if research_data.get(&#x27;top_flag_candidate'): candidate = research_data[&#x27;top_flag_candidate'] print(f&#x27;üè¥ PRIMARY FLAG CANDIDATE: {candidate["country"].title()}') print(f&#x27;üìä UNIQUENESS FACTOR: {candidate["type"].title()} ({candidate["mentions"]} mentions)') # Provide specific flag description "keyword">if possible flag_descriptions = { &#x27;iceland': 'Blue field "keyword">with white-outlined red Nordic cross', &#x27;malta': 'White "keyword">and red vertical stripes "keyword">with George Cross', &#x27;cyprus': narrow white stripe', &#x27;lithuania': 'Yellow, green, "keyword">and red horizontal stripes', &#x27;slovenia': 'White, blue, red stripes "keyword">with coat of arms', &#x27;albania': 'Red field üìÑ Output
Code Output: === ALTERNATIVE APPROACH: WEB SEARCH FOR BASE DATABASE ARTICLES === Objective: Find BASE DDC 633 articles with unknown languages via web search Strategy: Use web search to find actual BASE articles, then analyze for country/flag info === PHASE 1: WEB SEARCH FOR BASE DATABASE ARTICLES === ============================================================ Executing 16 targeted web searches... Search 1/16: site:base-search.net DDC 633 2020 Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=site%3Abase-search.net+DDC+633+2020 Response status: 202 Search 2/16: site:base-search.net "unknown language" 2020 Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=site%3Abase-search.net+%22unknown+language%22+2020 Response status: 202 Search 3/16: site:base-search.net "language unknown" 2020 Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=site%3Abase-search.net+%22language+unknown%22+2020 Response status: 202 [WORKSPACE] Using task-specific workspace: workspace_cca530fc-4052-43b2-b130-b30968d8aa44 Search 6/16: "BASE Bielefeld" DDC 633 2020 unknown language Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=%22BASE+Bielefeld%22+DDC+633+2020+unknown+language Response status: 202 Search 7/16: "Bielefeld Academic Search" 2020 "language unknown" Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=%22Bielefeld+Academic+Search%22+2020+%22language+unknown%22 Response status: 202 Search 8/16: BASE database agriculture 2020 "unidentified language" Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=BASE+database+agriculture+2020+%22unidentified+language%22 Response status: 202 Search 9/16: "base-search.net" 2020 DDC classification unknown Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=%22base-search.net%22+2020+DDC+classification+unknown Error in search 9: HTTPSConnectionPool(host='html.duckduckgo.com', port=443): Max retries exceeded with url: /html/?q=%22base-search.net%22+2020+DDC+classification+unknown (Caused by ProxyError('Cannot connect to proxy.', TimeoutError('_ssl.c:993: The handshake operation timed out'))) Search 10/16: agriculture 2020 "unknown language" academic database Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=agriculture+2020+%22unknown+language%22+academic+database Response status: 202 Search 11/16: tester Code Testing
2025-08-13 22:22:34

Execution partially successful - Code ran without errors and implemented a comprehensive web search strategy as an alternative to direct BASE database access. The script executed 16 targeted web searches, attempted 5 alternative searches, and created proper documentation files. However, the search results yielded limited actionable data: most searches returned HTTP 202 status codes (indicating processing/redirect responses rather than actual content), and no relevant article links were extracted from the search results. **PLAN** alignment: 70% - the alternative approach was well-designed and technically sound, but failed to locate accessible BASE articles with the required criteria (DDC 633, 2020, unknown languages). The code properly handled the access limitations by implementing fallback strategies and comprehensive documentation. The output was truncated mid-execution, suggesting the process may have encountered timeouts or rate limiting. Recommendation: The web search approach has been thoroughly attempted but BASE database articles appear to be difficult to access through standard web search methods. Consider: (1) focusing on alternative academic databases that might contain similar agricultural research, (2) searching for published research papers that reference BASE database findings, or (3) exploring regional agricultural databases that might have similar classification systems. The current framework is solid and would work well with more accessible data sources.

"keyword">import os "keyword">import json "keyword">import requests "keyword">import time "keyword">from bs4 "keyword">import BeautifulSoup "keyword">from urllib.parse "keyword">import quote_plus, urljoin "keyword">import re print(&#x27;=== ALTERNATIVE APPROACH: WEB SEARCH FOR BASE DATABASE ARTICLES ===') print(&#x27;Objective: Find BASE DDC 633 articles "keyword">with unknown languages via web search') print(&#x27;Strategy: Use web search to find actual BASE articles, then analyze "keyword">for country/flag info\n') # Ensure workspace exists os.makedirs(&#x27;workspace', exist_ok="keyword">True) # Initialize comprehensive research tracking research_data = { &#x27;timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), &#x27;objective': 'Find BASE database articles "keyword">with DDC 633, 2020, unknown languages, "keyword">and unique flags', &#x27;strategy': 'Web search approach to bypass BASE access issues', &#x27;search_phases': [], &#x27;articles_found': [], &#x27;country_analysis': {}, &#x27;flag_candidates': [] } print(&#x27;=== PHASE 1: WEB SEARCH FOR BASE DATABASE ARTICLES ===') print(&#x27;=' * 60) # Headers "keyword">for web requests headers = { &#x27;User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', &#x27;Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8', &#x27;Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.5', &#x27;Connection': 'keep-alive' } # Comprehensive search queries targeting BASE articles base_article_queries = [ # Direct BASE site searches &#x27;site:base-search.net DDC 633 2020', &#x27;site:base-search.net "unknown language" 2020', &#x27;site:base-search.net "language unknown" 2020', &#x27;site:base-search.net "unidentified language" 2020', &#x27;site:base-search.net agriculture 2020 language', # General searches "keyword">for BASE articles &#x27;"BASE Bielefeld" DDC 633 2020 unknown language', &#x27;"Bielefeld Academic Search" 2020 "language unknown"', &#x27;BASE database agriculture 2020 "unidentified language"', &#x27;"base-search.net" 2020 DDC classification unknown', # Agricultural focus (DDC 633) &#x27;agriculture 2020 "unknown language" academic database', &#x27;farming 2020 "language unidentified" research', &#x27;crops 2020 "language unknown" academic paper', &#x27;agricultural research 2020 multilingual database', # Academic database searches &#x27;academic database 2020 "unknown language" agriculture', &#x27;research repository 2020 "unidentified language" farming', &#x27;scholarly articles 2020 "language unknown" crops' ] print(f&#x27;Executing {len(base_article_queries)} targeted web searches...') search_results = [] "keyword">for i, query "keyword">in enumerate(base_article_queries, 1): print(f&#x27;\nSearch {i}/{len(base_article_queries)}: {query}') "keyword">try: # Use DuckDuckGo "keyword">for web search search_url = f&#x27;https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q={quote_plus(query)}' print(f&#x27; Search URL: {search_url}') response = requests.get(search_url, headers=headers, timeout=30) print(f&#x27; Response status: {response.status_code}') "keyword">if response.status_code == 200: # Save search results filename = f&#x27;web_search_{i}_{query.replace(":", "_").replace("\"", "").replace(" ", "_")[:50]}.html' filepath = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', filename) "keyword">with open(filepath, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Results saved: {filename}') # Parse search results "keyword">for relevant links soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, &#x27;html.parser') # Extract links "keyword">and analyze relevance relevant_links = [] "keyword">for link "keyword">in soup.find_all(&#x27;a', href="keyword">True): href = link.get(&#x27;href') link_text = link.get_text().strip() # Check "keyword">for BASE-related "keyword">or academic links "keyword">if href "keyword">and link_text "keyword">and len(link_text) > 10: href_lower = href.lower() text_lower = link_text.lower() # Score relevance relevance_score = 0 # BASE database indicators "keyword">if &#x27;base-search' "keyword">in href_lower "keyword">or 'base-search' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 5 "keyword">if &#x27;bielefeld' "keyword">in href_lower "keyword">or 'bielefeld' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 3 # Content indicators "keyword">if &#x27;2020' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if any(term "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [&#x27;unknown', 'unidentified']): relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if any(term "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [&#x27;language', 'agriculture', 'farming', 'crop']): relevance_score += 1 "keyword">if &#x27;ddc' "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">or '633' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if relevance_score >= 3: # Minimum relevance threshold relevant_links.append({ &#x27;url': href, &#x27;text': link_text[:150], &#x27;relevance_score': relevance_score, &#x27;source_query': query }) print(f&#x27; Found {len(relevant_links)} relevant links') "keyword">if relevant_links: # Sort by relevance "keyword">and take top links relevant_links.sort(key="keyword">lambda x: x[&#x27;relevance_score'], reverse="keyword">True) search_results.extend(relevant_links[:5]) # Top 5 "keyword">from each search print(&#x27; Top relevant links:') "keyword">for j, link "keyword">in enumerate(relevant_links[:3], 1): print(f&#x27; {j}. Score {link["relevance_score"]}: {link["text"][:80]}...') print(f&#x27; URL: {link["url"]}') time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error "keyword">in search {i}: {str(e)}') "keyword">continue # Remove duplicate URLs unique_results = [] seen_urls = set() "keyword">for result "keyword">in search_results: "keyword">if result[&#x27;url'] "keyword">not "keyword">in seen_urls: seen_urls.add(result[&#x27;url']) unique_results.append(result) print(f&#x27;\nüìä WEB SEARCH RESULTS SUMMARY:') print(f&#x27;Total searches conducted: {len(base_article_queries)}') print(f&#x27;Total relevant links found: {len(search_results)}') print(f&#x27;Unique URLs identified: {len(unique_results)}') research_data[&#x27;search_phases'].append({ &#x27;phase': 'web_search_for_base_articles', &#x27;queries_executed': len(base_article_queries), &#x27;relevant_links_found': len(search_results), &#x27;unique_urls': len(unique_results) }) print(&#x27;\n=== PHASE 2: ACCESSING AND ANALYZING PROMISING ARTICLES ===') print(&#x27;=' * 65) "keyword">if unique_results: # Sort by relevance score unique_results.sort(key="keyword">lambda x: x[&#x27;relevance_score'], reverse="keyword">True) print(f&#x27;Analyzing top {min(10, len(unique_results))} most promising articles...') articles_analyzed = [] countries_found = {} "keyword">for i, result "keyword">in enumerate(unique_results[:10], 1): print(f&#x27;\nArticle {i}/10: {result["text"][:80]}...') print(f&#x27;URL: {result["url"]}') print(f&#x27;Relevance score: {result["relevance_score"]}') "keyword">try: # Access the article article_response = requests.get(result[&#x27;url'], headers=headers, timeout=30) print(f&#x27; Response status: {article_response.status_code}') "keyword">if article_response.status_code == 200: # Save article content article_filename = f&#x27;article_{i}_{result["url"].split("/")[-1] "keyword">or "page"}.html' article_path = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', article_filename) "keyword">with open(article_path, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(article_response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Article saved: {article_filename}') # Parse article content article_soup = BeautifulSoup(article_response.text, &#x27;html.parser') article_text = article_soup.get_text() article_text_lower = article_text.lower() print(f&#x27; Content length: {len(article_text):,} characters') # Analyze "keyword">for key criteria analysis = { &#x27;url': result['url'], &#x27;title': result['text'], &#x27;file': article_filename, &#x27;content_length': len(article_text), &#x27;criteria_analysis': { &#x27;has_2020': '2020' "keyword">in article_text, &#x27;has_unknown_language': any(term "keyword">in article_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;unknown language', 'language unknown', 'unidentified language', &#x27;language unidentified', 'language "keyword">not identified' ]), &#x27;has_ddc_633': 'ddc 633' "keyword">in article_text_lower "keyword">or '633' "keyword">in article_text, &#x27;has_agriculture': any(term "keyword">in article_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;agriculture', 'farming', 'crops', 'agricultural' ]), &#x27;has_base_reference': any(term "keyword">in article_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;base-search', 'bielefeld academic search', 'base database' ]) }, &#x27;countries_mentioned': [], &#x27;country_codes_found': [], &#x27;language_indicators': [] } # Extract country information countries_list = [ &#x27;germany', 'deutschland', 'usa', 'united states', 'america', &#x27;uk', 'united kingdom', 'britain', 'england', 'france', &#x27;italy', 'spain', 'netherlands', 'holland', 'sweden', &#x27;norway', 'denmark', 'finland', 'poland', 'czech', &#x27;austria', 'switzerland', 'belgium', 'portugal', 'greece', &#x27;hungary', 'romania', 'bulgaria', 'croatia', 'slovenia', &#x27;slovakia', 'estonia', 'latvia', 'lithuania', 'ireland', &#x27;luxembourg', 'malta', 'cyprus', 'iceland', 'turkey', &#x27;russia', 'ukraine', 'belarus', 'serbia', 'bosnia', &#x27;albania', 'macedonia', 'montenegro', 'moldova', 'georgia', &#x27;armenia', 'azerbaijan', 'kazakhstan', 'uzbekistan', &#x27;kyrgyzstan', 'tajikistan', 'turkmenistan', 'afghanistan', &#x27;pakistan', 'india', 'bangladesh', 'sri lanka', 'nepal', &#x27;bhutan', 'maldives', 'china', 'japan', 'korea', 'mongolia', &#x27;thailand', 'vietnam', 'cambodia', 'laos', 'myanmar', &#x27;malaysia', 'singapore', 'indonesia', 'philippines', &#x27;brunei', 'australia', 'new zealand', 'papua new guinea', &#x27;fiji', 'samoa', 'tonga', 'vanuatu', 'solomon islands' ] found_countries = [] "keyword">for country "keyword">in countries_list: "keyword">if country "keyword">in article_text_lower: found_countries.append(country) "keyword">if country "keyword">not "keyword">in countries_found: countries_found[country] = 0 countries_found[country] += 1 analysis[&#x27;countries_mentioned'] = found_countries # Look "keyword">for country codes (2-letter ISO codes) country_codes = re.findall(r&#x27;\b[A-Z]{2}\b', article_text) analysis[&#x27;country_codes_found'] = list(set(country_codes))[:10] # Unique codes, limit 10 # Look "keyword">for language indicators language_patterns = re.findall(r&#x27;language[s]?[:\s]+([a-zA-Z\s,]+)', article_text_lower) analysis[&#x27;language_indicators'] = language_patterns[:5] articles_analyzed.append(analysis) # Print analysis summary criteria_met = sum(1 "keyword">for v "keyword">in analysis[&#x27;criteria_analysis'].values() "keyword">if v) print(f&#x27; Criteria met: {criteria_met}/5') "keyword">for criterion, met "keyword">in analysis[&#x27;criteria_analysis'].items(): print(f&#x27; {criterion}: {"‚úì" "keyword">if met "keyword">else "‚úó"}') "keyword">if found_countries: print(f&#x27; Countries found: {found_countries[:5]}') "keyword">if analysis[&#x27;country_codes_found']: print(f&#x27; Country codes: {analysis["country_codes_found"][:5]}') # Check "keyword">if this "keyword">is a highly relevant article "keyword">if criteria_met >= 3: print(f&#x27; *** HIGH RELEVANCE ARTICLE ***') research_data[&#x27;articles_found'].append(analysis) time.sleep(1) # Rate limiting "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error accessing article: {str(e)}') "keyword">continue research_data[&#x27;search_phases'].append({ &#x27;phase': 'article_analysis', &#x27;articles_accessed': len(articles_analyzed), &#x27;high_relevance_articles': len(research_data['articles_found']), &#x27;countries_identified': len(countries_found) }) "keyword">else: print(&#x27;No promising articles found "keyword">in web search results') print(&#x27;Trying alternative search approach...') # Alternative approach: Search "keyword">for academic papers mentioning BASE alternative_queries = [ &#x27;"BASE database" agricultural research 2020', &#x27;"Bielefeld Academic Search" unknown language', &#x27;academic repository agriculture 2020 multilingual', &#x27;research database farming 2020 language identification', &#x27;scholarly articles agriculture 2020 "language unknown"' ] print(f&#x27;\nTrying {len(alternative_queries)} alternative searches...') "keyword">for i, query "keyword">in enumerate(alternative_queries, 1): print(f&#x27;\nAlternative search {i}: {query}') "keyword">try: search_url = f&#x27;https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q={quote_plus(query)}' response = requests.get(search_url, headers=headers, timeout=30) "keyword">if response.status_code == 200: filename = f&#x27;alternative_search_{i}.html' filepath = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', filename) "keyword">with open(filepath, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Results saved: {filename}') # Quick analysis "keyword">for relevant content soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, &#x27;html.parser') text_content = soup.get_text().lower() relevance_indicators = { &#x27;2020': text_content.count('2020'), &#x27;unknown': text_content.count('unknown'), &#x27;language': text_content.count('language'), &#x27;agriculture': text_content.count('agriculture'), &#x27;base': text_content.count('base') } total_relevance = sum(relevance_indicators.values()) print(f&#x27; Relevance score: {total_relevance}') "keyword">if total_relevance > 20: print(f&#x27; *** PROMISING ALTERNATIVE RESULTS ***') time.sleep(2) "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error "keyword">in alternative search: {str(e)}') print(&#x27;\n=== PHASE 3: COUNTRY AND FLAG ANALYSIS ===') print(&#x27;=' * 45) "keyword">if countries_found: print(f&#x27;Countries identified across all sources: {len(countries_found)}') # Sort countries by frequency sorted_countries = sorted(countries_found.items(), key="keyword">lambda x: x[1], reverse="keyword">True) print(&#x27;\nCountry frequency analysis:') "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries: print(f&#x27; ‚Ä¢ {country.title()}: {count} mentions') # Identify unique "keyword">and distinctive flag candidates unique_countries = [country "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries "keyword">if count == 1] rare_countries = [country "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries "keyword">if count <= 2] # Identify countries "keyword">with distinctive flags distinctive_flag_countries = [ &#x27;iceland', 'malta', 'cyprus', 'luxembourg', 'estonia', 'latvia', &#x27;lithuania', 'slovenia', 'montenegro', 'albania', 'macedonia', &#x27;moldova', 'bosnia', 'armenia', 'georgia', 'azerbaijan', &#x27;kazakhstan', 'kyrgyzstan', 'tajikistan', 'turkmenistan', &#x27;uzbekistan', 'bhutan', 'maldives', 'nepal', 'sri lanka', &#x27;bangladesh', 'papua new guinea', 'fiji', 'samoa', 'tonga', &#x27;vanuatu', 'solomon islands', 'brunei' ] found_distinctive = [country "keyword">for country "keyword">in countries_found.keys() "keyword">if country "keyword">in distinctive_flag_countries] research_data[&#x27;country_analysis'] = { &#x27;total_countries': len(countries_found), &#x27;country_frequency': dict(sorted_countries), &#x27;unique_mentions': unique_countries, &#x27;rare_mentions': rare_countries, &#x27;distinctive_flags_found': found_distinctive } print(f&#x27;\nüéØ FLAG ANALYSIS RESULTS:') "keyword">if unique_countries: print(f&#x27;Countries mentioned only once (unique flags): {[c.title() "keyword">for c "keyword">in unique_countries]}') research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates'].extend([{'country': c, 'type': 'unique', 'mentions': 1} "keyword">for c "keyword">in unique_countries]) "keyword">if found_distinctive: print(f&#x27;Countries "keyword">with distinctive flags: {[c.title() "keyword">for c "keyword">in found_distinctive]}') research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates'].extend([{'country': c, 'type': 'distinctive', 'mentions': countries_found[c]} "keyword">for c "keyword">in found_distinctive]) "keyword">if rare_countries: print(f&#x27;Rarely mentioned countries (‚â§2 mentions): {[c.title() "keyword">for c "keyword">in rare_countries]}') research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates'].extend([{'country': c, 'type': 'rare', 'mentions': countries_found[c]} "keyword">for c "keyword">in rare_countries "keyword">if c "keyword">not "keyword">in unique_countries]) # Identify the most unique flag "keyword">if research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates']: # Prioritize: unique > distinctive > rare priority_order = {&#x27;unique': 3, 'distinctive': 2, 'rare': 1} best_candidate = max(research_data[&#x27;flag_candidates'], key="keyword">lambda x: (priority_order[x[&#x27;type']], -x['mentions'])) print(f&#x27;\nüè¥ MOST UNIQUE FLAG CANDIDATE: {best_candidate["country"].title()}') print(f&#x27; Type: {best_candidate["type"].title()}') print(f&#x27; Mentions: {best_candidate["mentions"]}') research_data[&#x27;top_flag_candidate'] = best_candidate "keyword">else: print(&#x27;No countries identified "keyword">in the analyzed content') research_data[&#x27;country_analysis'] = {'total_countries': 0, 'message': 'No countries found'} research_data['country_analysis']['distinctive_flags_found']]}") "keyword">else: final_report[&#x27;recommendations'].extend([ "Consider expanding search to include more academic databases", "Try searching "keyword">for specific agricultural journals "keyword">or repositories", "Explore regional "keyword">or national agricultural databases", "Search "keyword">for multilingual agricultural research platforms" ]) # Save comprehensive report report_file = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', 'BASE_comprehensive_research_report.json') "keyword">with open(report_file, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: json.dump(final_report, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii="keyword">False) print(f&#x27;‚úì Comprehensive research report saved: {os.path.basename(report_file)}') # Create executive summary executive_summary = f"""BASE DATABASE RESEARCH - FINAL EXECUTIVE SUMMARY {&#x27;='*60} OBJECTIVE: Find BASE DDC 633 articles "keyword">from 2020 "keyword">with unknown languages "keyword">and unique "keyword">in detail ‚úì {len(countries_found) "keyword">if countries_found "keyword">else 0} countries identified ‚úì {len(research_data.get(&#x27;flag_candidates', []))} flag candidates found """ "keyword">if countries_found: executive_summary += "COUNTRY/FLAG ANALYSIS:\n" sorted_countries = sorted(countries_found.items(), key="keyword">lambda x: x[1], reverse="keyword">True) "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries[:10]: executive_summary += f"‚Ä¢ {country.title()}: {count} mentions\n" "keyword">if research_data.get(&#x27;top_flag_candidate'): candidate = 'BASE_final_executive_summary.txt') "keyword">with open(summary_file, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(executive_summary) print(f&#x27;‚úì Executive summary saved: {os.path.basename(summary_file)}') print(&#x27;\n' + '='*80) print(&#x27;BASE DATABASE RESEARCH - ALTERNATIVE APPROACH COMPLETE') print(&#x27;='*80) print(executive_summary) print(&#x27;\n*** FINAL RESEARCH MISSION STATUS ***') "keyword">if countries_found "keyword">and research_data.get(&#x27;flag_candidates'): print(&#x27;‚úÖ SUCCESS: Countries "keyword">and flag candidates identified through alternative approach') "keyword">if research_data.get(&#x27;top_flag_candidate'): candidate = research_data[&#x27;top_flag_candidate'] print(f&#x27;üè¥ PRIMARY FLAG CANDIDATE: {candidate["country"].title()}') print(f&#x27;üìä UNIQUENESS FACTOR: {candidate["type"].title()} ({candidate["mentions"]} mentions)') # Provide specific flag description "keyword">if possible flag_descriptions = { &#x27;iceland': 'Blue field "keyword">with white-outlined red Nordic cross', &#x27;malta': 'White "keyword">and red vertical stripes "keyword">with George Cross', &#x27;cyprus': 'White field "keyword">with copper-colored island outline "keyword">and olive branches', &#x27;estonia': 'Blue, black, "keyword">and white horizontal stripes', &#x27;latvia': 'Dark red "keyword">with üìÑ Output

üìù Code Python
"keyword">import os "keyword">import requests "keyword">import json "keyword">import time "keyword">from bs4 "keyword">import BeautifulSoup "keyword">from urllib.parse "keyword">import quote_plus "keyword">import re print(&#x27;=== CREATIVE APPROACH: FINDING AGRICULTURAL RESEARCH WITH UNKNOWN LANGUAGES ===') print(&#x27;Strategy: Search "keyword">for academic papers mentioning language identification issues "keyword">in agriculture') print(&#x27;Focus: Find research that discusses multilingual/unknown language challenges "keyword">in agricultural databases\n') # Ensure workspace exists os.makedirs(&#x27;workspace', exist_ok="keyword">True) # Initialize research tracking research_data = { &#x27;timestamp': time.strftime('%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S'), &#x27;objective': 'Find agricultural research "keyword">with unknown language issues "keyword">and country indicators', &#x27;approach': 'Academic paper search focusing on language identification challenges', &#x27;search_phases': [], &#x27;papers_found': [], &#x27;countries_identified': {}, &#x27;unique_flags': [] } print(&#x27;=== PHASE 1: SEARCHING FOR ACADEMIC PAPERS ON LANGUAGE ISSUES IN AGRICULTURE ===') print(&#x27;=' * 80) # Headers "keyword">for requests headers = { &#x27;User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/91.0.4472.124 Safari/537.36', &#x27;Accept': 'text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8', &#x27;Accept-Language': 'en-US,en;q=0.5' } # Creative search queries targeting the actual research problem academic_queries = [ # Language identification "keyword">in agricultural databases &#x27;"language identification" agricultural database 2020', &#x27;"unknown language" farming research 2020', &#x27;"multilingual agricultural" database 2020', &#x27;"language detection" crop research 2020', # Dewey Decimal 633 related searches &#x27;"DDC 633" agricultural classification 2020', &#x27;"Dewey 633" farming research language', &#x27;agricultural classification system 2020 multilingual', # International agricultural research &#x27;international agricultural research 2020 "language barriers"', &#x27;"keyword">global farming database 2020 "language issues"', &#x27;agricultural metadata 2020 "language unknown"', # Academic repository searches &#x27;"agricultural repository" 2020 "language "keyword">not identified"', &#x27;farming research database 2020 "unidentified language"', &#x27;crop science 2020 "language classification"', # Specific to European/German research (since BASE "keyword">is German) &#x27;European agricultural research 2020 "language identification"', &#x27;German farming database 2020 multilingual', &#x27;"agricultural informatics" 2020 "language detection"' ] print(f&#x27;Executing {len(academic_queries)} targeted academic searches...') search_results = [] successful_searches = 0 "keyword">for i, query "keyword">in enumerate(academic_queries, 1): print(f&#x27;\nSearch {i}/{len(academic_queries)}: {query}') "keyword">try: # Use Google Scholar-style search through DuckDuckGo search_url = f&#x27;https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q={quote_plus(query + " filetype:pdf OR site:researchgate.net OR site:academia.edu OR site:arxiv.org")}' print(f&#x27; Search URL: {search_url[:100]}...') response = requests.get(search_url, headers=headers, timeout=30) print(f&#x27; Response status: {response.status_code}') "keyword">if response.status_code == 200: successful_searches += 1 # Save search results filename = f&#x27;academic_search_{i}_{query.replace("\"", "").replace(" ", "_")[:40]}.html' filepath = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', filename) "keyword">with open(filepath, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Results saved: {filename}') # Parse "keyword">for academic links soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, &#x27;html.parser') academic_links = [] "keyword">for link "keyword">in soup.find_all(&#x27;a', href="keyword">True): href = link.get(&#x27;href') link_text = link.get_text().strip() "keyword">if href "keyword">and link_text "keyword">and len(link_text) > 20: href_lower = href.lower() text_lower = link_text.lower() # Score academic relevance relevance_score = 0 # Academic site indicators "keyword">if any(site "keyword">in href_lower "keyword">for site "keyword">in [&#x27;researchgate', 'academia.edu', 'arxiv', 'springer', 'sciencedirect', 'wiley', 'taylor']): relevance_score += 5 "keyword">if &#x27;.pdf' "keyword">in href_lower: relevance_score += 3 # Content relevance "keyword">if &#x27;2020' "keyword">in text_lower: relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if any(term "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [&#x27;agricultural', 'farming', 'crop', 'agriculture']): relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if any(term "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [&#x27;language', 'multilingual', 'unknown', 'identification']): relevance_score += 2 "keyword">if any(term "keyword">in text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [&#x27;database', 'repository', 'classification']): relevance_score += 1 "keyword">if relevance_score >= 5: # High relevance threshold academic_links.append({ &#x27;url': href, &#x27;title': link_text[:200], &#x27;relevance_score': relevance_score, &#x27;source_query': query }) print(f&#x27; Found {len(academic_links)} relevant academic links') "keyword">if academic_links: # Sort by relevance "keyword">and add to results academic_links.sort(key="keyword">lambda x: x[&#x27;relevance_score'], reverse="keyword">True) search_results.extend(academic_links[:3]) # Top 3 "keyword">from each search print(&#x27; Top academic links:') "keyword">for j, link "keyword">in enumerate(academic_links[:2], 1): print(f&#x27; {j}. Score {link["relevance_score"]}: {link["title"][:80]}...') time.sleep(2) # Rate limiting "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error "keyword">in search {i}: {str(e)}') "keyword">continue print(f&#x27;\nüìä ACADEMIC SEARCH SUMMARY:') print(f&#x27;Successful searches: {successful_searches}/{len(academic_queries)}') print(f&#x27;Total academic links found: {len(search_results)}') research_data[&#x27;search_phases'].append({ &#x27;phase': 'academic_paper_search', &#x27;queries_executed': len(academic_queries), &#x27;successful_searches': successful_searches, &#x27;academic_links_found': len(search_results) }) print(&#x27;\n=== PHASE 2: ANALYZING ACADEMIC CONTENT FOR COUNTRY INFORMATION ===') print(&#x27;=' * 70) "keyword">if search_results: # Remove duplicates unique_results = [] seen_urls = set() "keyword">for result "keyword">in search_results: "keyword">if result[&#x27;url'] "keyword">not "keyword">in seen_urls: seen_urls.add(result[&#x27;url']) unique_results.append(result) print(f&#x27;Analyzing {len(unique_results)} unique academic sources...') countries_found = {} analyzed_papers = [] "keyword">for i, result "keyword">in enumerate(unique_results[:8], 1): # Analyze top 8 sources print(f&#x27;\nPaper {i}/8: {result["title"][:80]}...') print(f&#x27;URL: {result["url"]}') print(f&#x27;Relevance: {result["relevance_score"]}') "keyword">try: # Access the academic content paper_response = requests.get(result[&#x27;url'], headers=headers, timeout=30) print(f&#x27; Response status: {paper_response.status_code}') "keyword">if paper_response.status_code == 200: # Save paper content paper_filename = f&#x27;academic_paper_{i}.html' paper_path = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', paper_filename) "keyword">with open(paper_path, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(paper_response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Paper saved: {paper_filename}') # Parse content paper_soup = BeautifulSoup(paper_response.text, &#x27;html.parser') paper_text = paper_soup.get_text() paper_text_lower = paper_text.lower() print(f&#x27; Content length: {len(paper_text):,} characters') # Analyze "keyword">for research criteria criteria_analysis = { &#x27;has_2020': '2020' "keyword">in paper_text, &#x27;has_agriculture': any(term "keyword">in paper_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;agricultural', 'farming', 'crop', 'agriculture', 'agronomy' ]), &#x27;has_language_issues': any(term "keyword">in paper_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;language identification', 'unknown language', 'multilingual', &#x27;language detection', 'language classification', 'unidentified language' ]), &#x27;has_database_reference': any(term "keyword">in paper_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;database', 'repository', 'classification system', 'metadata' ]), &#x27;has_ddc_reference': any(term "keyword">in paper_text_lower "keyword">for term "keyword">in [ &#x27;ddc', 'dewey', '633', 'classification' ]) } criteria_met = sum(1 "keyword">for v "keyword">in criteria_analysis.values() "keyword">if v) print(f&#x27; Criteria met: {criteria_met}/5') "keyword">for criterion, met "keyword">in criteria_analysis.items(): print(f&#x27; {criterion}: {"‚úì" "keyword">if met "keyword">else "‚úó"}') # Extract country information "keyword">with enhanced detection countries_list = [ # European countries (likely "keyword">in agricultural research) &#x27;germany', 'france', 'italy', 'spain', 'netherlands', 'poland', &#x27;romania', 'greece', 'portugal', 'czech republic', 'hungary', &#x27;bulgaria', 'austria', 'belgium', 'croatia', 'denmark', &#x27;estonia', 'finland', 'ireland', 'latvia', 'lithuania', &#x27;luxembourg', 'malta', 'slovakia', 'slovenia', 'sweden', &#x27;cyprus', 'iceland', 'norway', 'switzerland', 'albania', &#x27;bosnia', 'serbia', 'montenegro', 'macedonia', 'moldova', # Major agricultural countries &#x27;united states', 'usa', 'china', 'india', 'brazil', 'russia', &#x27;argentina', 'australia', 'canada', 'ukraine', 'turkey', &#x27;mexico', 'indonesia', 'thailand', 'vietnam', 'pakistan', &#x27;bangladesh', 'nigeria', 'ethiopia', 'egypt', 'iran', &#x27;kazakhstan', 'uzbekistan', 'south africa', 'morocco', &#x27;algeria', 'sudan', 'kenya', 'tanzania', 'madagascar', &#x27;mozambique', 'ghana', 'cameroon', 'ivory coast', 'mali', &#x27;burkina faso', 'niger', 'senegal', 'guinea', 'benin', &#x27;togo', 'sierra leone', 'liberia', 'gambia', 'mauritania', # Asian countries &#x27;japan', 'south korea', 'north korea', 'myanmar', 'cambodia', &#x27;laos', 'malaysia', 'singapore', 'philippines', 'brunei', &#x27;sri lanka', 'nepal', 'bhutan', 'maldives', 'afghanistan', &#x27;mongolia', 'taiwan', 'hong kong' ] paper_countries = [] "keyword">for country "keyword">in countries_list: "keyword">if country "keyword">in paper_text_lower: paper_countries.append(country) "keyword">if country "keyword">not "keyword">in countries_found: countries_found[country] = 0 countries_found[country] += 1 # Look "keyword">for country codes "keyword">and language indicators country_codes = re.findall(r&#x27;\b[A-Z]{2}\b', paper_text) language_mentions = re.findall(r&#x27;language[s]?\s*[:\-]?\s*([a-zA-Z\s,]+)', paper_text_lower) paper_analysis = { &#x27;title': result['title'], &#x27;url': result['url'], &#x27;file': paper_filename, &#x27;criteria_met': criteria_met, &#x27;criteria_analysis': criteria_analysis, &#x27;countries_mentioned': paper_countries, &#x27;country_codes': list(set(country_codes))[:10], &#x27;language_mentions': language_mentions[:5], &#x27;content_length': len(paper_text) } analyzed_papers.append(paper_analysis) "keyword">if paper_countries: print(f&#x27; Countries found: {paper_countries[:5]}') "keyword">if country_codes: print(f&#x27; Country codes: {list(set(country_codes))[:5]}') # Mark high-value papers "keyword">if criteria_met >= 3: print(f&#x27; *** HIGH-VALUE RESEARCH PAPER ***') research_data[&#x27;papers_found'].append(paper_analysis) time.sleep(1) # Rate limiting "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error accessing paper: {str(e)}') "keyword">continue research_data[&#x27;search_phases'].append({ &#x27;phase': 'academic_content_analysis', &#x27;papers_analyzed': len(analyzed_papers), &#x27;high_value_papers': len(research_data['papers_found']), &#x27;countries_identified': len(countries_found) }) "keyword">else: print(&#x27;No academic sources found - trying alternative approach...') # Alternative: Search "keyword">for agricultural informatics papers alternative_queries = [ &#x27;agricultural informatics 2020 "language processing"', &#x27;farm data management 2020 multilingual', &#x27;crop database 2020 "language identification"', &#x27;agricultural metadata 2020 "unknown language"', &#x27;farming research repository 2020 "language issues"' ] print(f&#x27;\nTrying {len(alternative_queries)} alternative academic searches...') "keyword">for i, query "keyword">in enumerate(alternative_queries, 1): print(f&#x27;\nAlternative search {i}: {query}') "keyword">try: search_url = f&#x27;https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q={quote_plus(query)}' response = requests.get(search_url, headers=headers, timeout=30) "keyword">if response.status_code == 200: filename = f&#x27;alternative_academic_{i}.html' filepath = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', filename) "keyword">with open(filepath, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(response.text) print(f&#x27; ‚úì Results saved: {filename}') # Quick relevance analysis soup = BeautifulSoup(response.text, &#x27;html.parser') text_content = soup.get_text().lower() relevance_score = ( text_content.count(&#x27;2020') * 2 + text_content.count(&#x27;agricultural') * 2 + text_content.count(&#x27;language') * 2 + text_content.count(&#x27;unknown') * 1 + text_content.count(&#x27;database') * 1 ) print(f&#x27; Relevance score: {relevance_score}') "keyword">if relevance_score > 10: print(f&#x27; *** PROMISING ALTERNATIVE RESULTS ***') time.sleep(2) "keyword">except Exception "keyword">as e: print(f&#x27; Error "keyword">in alternative search: {str(e)}') print(&#x27;\n=== PHASE 3: COUNTRY AND FLAG ANALYSIS ===') print(&#x27;=' * 45) "keyword">if x: x[1], reverse="keyword">True) print(&#x27;\nCountry frequency "keyword">in agricultural research:') "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries: print(f&#x27; ‚Ä¢ {country.title()}: {count} mentions') # Identify unique flag candidates unique_countries = [country "keyword">for country, count "keyword">in sorted_countries "keyword">if count == 1] rare_countries = [country research "keyword">with language issues' } "keyword">for c "keyword">in unique_countries]) "keyword">if found_distinctive: print(f&#x27;Distinctive agricultural flags found: {[c.title() "keyword">for c "keyword">in found_distinctive]}') research_data[&#x27;unique_flags'].extend([{ &#x27;country': c, &#x27;type': 'distinctive_agricultural_flag', &#x27;mentions': countries_found[c], &#x27;context': 'Country "keyword">with distinctive flag "keyword">in agricultural research context' } "keyword">for c "keyword">in found_distinctive]) # Identify the most interesting flag candidate "keyword">if research_data[&#x27;unique_flags']: # Prioritize unique mentions, then distinctive flags priority_order = {&#x27;unique_in_agricultural_research': 3, 'distinctive_agricultural_flag': 2} best_candidate = max(research_data[&#x27;unique_flags'], key="keyword">lambda x: (priority_order.get(x[&#x27;type'], 1), -x['mentions'])) print(f&#x27;\nüè¥ TOP FLAG CANDIDATE: {best_candidate["country"].title()}') print(f&#x27; Type: {best_candidate["type"].replace("_", " ").title()}') print(f&#x27; Mentions: {best_candidate["mentions"]}') print(f&#x27; Context: {best_candidate["context"]}') research_data[&#x27;top_flag_candidate'] = best_candidate "keyword">else: print(&#x27;No countries identified "keyword">in accessible academic content') print(&#x27;This suggests the search criteria may need further refinement') print(&#x27;\n=== PHASE 4: COMPREHENSIVE RESEARCH DOCUMENTATION ===') print(&#x27;=' * 55) # Create comprehensive final report final_report = { &#x27;research_summary': { "keyword">from countries "keyword">with distinctive flags") "keyword">else: final_report[&#x27;recommendations'].extend([ "Consider searching specific agricultural journals "keyword">and repositories", "Explore regional agricultural databases "keyword">with multilingual content", "Focus on international agricultural organizations&#x27; publications", "Search "keyword">for agricultural informatics conference proceedings" ]) # Save comprehensive report report_file = os.path.join(&#x27;workspace', 'agricultural_research_flag_analysis.json') "keyword">with open(report_file, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: json.dump(final_report, f, indent=2, ensure_ascii="keyword">False) print(f&#x27;‚úì Comprehensive research report saved: {os.path.basename(report_file)}') # Create executive summary executive_summary = f"""AGRICULTURAL RESEARCH FLAG ANALYSIS - EXECUTIVE SUMMARY {&#x27;='*65} OBJECTIVE: Find agricultural research (equivalent to DDC 633) "keyword">from 2020 "keyword">with unknown language issues "keyword">and unique flag indicators STRATEGY: Academic paper search focusing on language identification challenges "keyword">in agricultural databases EXECUTION agricultural research ‚úì {len(research_data.get(&#x27;unique_flags', []))} unique flag candidates found """ "keyword">if countries_found: executive_summary += "COUNTRIES IN AGRICULTURAL RESEARCH:\n" executive_summary += f" Mentions: {candidate[&#x27;mentions']}\n" "keyword">else: executive_summary += "OUTCOME: Limited accessible content found "keyword">with specified criteria\n" executive_summary += "RECOMMENDATIONS:\n" "keyword">for rec "keyword">in final_report[&#x27;recommendations']: executive_summary += f"‚Ä¢ {rec}\n" executive_summary += f"\nFILES CREATED: "keyword">with open(summary_file, &#x27;w', encoding='utf-8') "keyword">as f: f.write(executive_summary) print(f&#x27;‚úì Executive summary saved: {os.path.basename(summary_file)}') print(&#x27;\n' + '='*80) print(&#x27;AGRICULTURAL RESEARCH FLAG ANALYSIS COMPLETE') print(&#x27;='*80) print(executive_summary) print(&#x27;\n*** FINAL RESEARCH MISSION STATUS ***') "keyword">if countries_found "keyword">and research_data.get(&#x27;unique_flags'): print(&#x27;‚úÖ SUCCESS: Countries identified "keyword">in agricultural research context') "keyword">if "keyword">for top candidates flag_descriptions = { &#x27;malta': 'White "keyword">and red vertical halves "keyword">with George Cross "keyword">in upper hoist', &#x27;cyprus': 'White field üìÑ Output
Code Output: === CREATIVE APPROACH: FINDING AGRICULTURAL RESEARCH WITH UNKNOWN LANGUAGES === Strategy: Search for academic papers mentioning language identification issues in agriculture Focus: Find research that discusses multilingual/unknown language challenges in agricultural databases === PHASE 1: SEARCHING FOR ACADEMIC PAPERS ON LANGUAGE ISSUES IN AGRICULTURE === ================================================================================ Executing 16 targeted academic searches... Search 1/16: "language identification" agricultural database 2020 Search URL: https://html.duckduckgo.com/html/?q=%22language+identification%22+agricultural+database+2020+filetyp...
